summary: This mod adds the ability to quickly incubate eggs with the fire of the forge and create a horde of creatures(2.1Chickens,Goose,Dwarveggman,Dwarvworm,Chaurus,Crab,Mudcrab,Dwarvcrab,Spiders,Roach,Dwarvspider,MiniDragons,Dwarveyebot;3.5TER+ChaurusHunters,FrozenChaurus,SpectralDragon,Netch,Scrib,Chagohod,Spiders,RealDragons,Raptor,FlyingChaurus)
descriptionHtml:
[color=#ff0000][b]Incubated EGGS[/b][/color][color=#00ff00][b] versions 2.1.1 (No DLC) and 3.5.5 TER (Dawnguard and Dragonborn Edition) [/b][/color]

[color=#00ff00] Optional File: Esp Version Française[/color]

This mod adds the ability to quickly incubate eggs with the fire of the forge, and quickly create a horde of little creatures (5, 15, 50, 100, [i]MORE ?[/i] ...[color=#ff0000]ATTENTION with the freezes in your computer ![/color]) that are following you as if you were their mother !

To obtain these eggs, simply bring any “XXX Egg ” (found with some merchants) to a forge and create the "Incubated XXX Egg" in the "misc" section. Now open up your inventory, navigate to "Scrolls" and there they are. You throw them and when they hit the ground they hatch into little creatures. Some of these little creatures can follow you !

[i]When your creatures die, remember to loot their corpses for more eggs ![/i]

[img]https://i.imgur.com/1i4FMm7h.jpg[/img]

[img]https://i.imgur.com/d0mF3S9.gif[/img]

On your Mount (a Raptor), to be accompanied by many Raptors (or other creatures), no problem if you have the mod [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/15524/?]Amazing Follower Tweaks by Dheuster [/url]

[color=#ff0000] Video with the version 3.5.5 TER between 7’58’’ and the end [/color] (Thanks to KnightStreakGaming)

->->->->->->->->->->->->->->->->[youtube]1idtRUtOSnA[/youtube]<-<-<-<-<-<-<-<-<-<-<-<-<-<-<-

[color=#00ff00]20[/color] [color=#ff0000]DRAGON'S EGGS[/color] (Slaughterfish model for the Egg/Icewraith model for the Mini Dragons)

[color=#00ff00][size="7"] [b]For the Mini Dragons and the Dwarven Eyebot +[i] only in the version TER[/i], the Spectral Dragon, the Raptor and the Real Dragons: [/size][/b][/color] in [color=#ff8c00]Windhelm[/color] (Merchants: [i] Elda at the Candlehearth, Ambarys at the Corner Club, Quintus at the White Phial, Revyn Sadri, Hillevi[/i] ).The eggs are also in the dead creatures !

[url=http://www.hostingpics.net/viewer.php?id=971077incubatedeggs3.jpg][img]http://img4.hostingpics.net/pics/971077incubatedeggs3.jpg[/img][/url]

[url=http://www.hostingpics.net/viewer.php?id=845942Armyofdragons.jpg][img]http://img11.hostingpics.net/pics/845942Armyofdragons.jpg[/img][/url]


[color=#00ff00]12[/color] [color=#ff0000]CHAURUS EGGS[/color]

[color=#00ff00][size="7"] [b]For the Chaurus,the Dwarvworm, the Crab, the Mudcrab and the Dwarvcrab +[i] only in the version TER[/i], the Chaurus Hunters, the Frozen Chaurus, the Chagohod and the Flying Chaurus: [/size][/b][/color] in [color=#ff8c00]Riften [/color](Merchants: [i] Keeravia at the Bee and Barb, Elgrim at Elgrim’s Elixirs, Marise Aravel, Vekel at the Ragged Flagorn in the Ratways[/i] ).The eggs are also in the dead creatures !

Attention, these creatures are very aggressive

[url=http://www.hostingpics.net/viewer.php?id=570795armyofdwarvworms.jpg][img]http://img4.hostingpics.net/pics/570795armyofdwarvworms.jpg[/img][/url]

[url=http://www.hostingpics.net/viewer.php?id=763728armyofchaurus.jpg][img]http://img4.hostingpics.net/pics/763728armyofchaurus.jpg[/img][/url]

[url=http://www.hostingpics.net/viewer.php?id=268213veryaggressivecrabs.jpg][img]http://img4.hostingpics.net/pics/268213veryaggressivecrabs.jpg[/img][/url]

[url=http://www.hostingpics.net/viewer.php?id=352958veryaggressivedwarvcrabs.jpg][img]http://img4.hostingpics.net/pics/352958veryaggressivedwarvcrabs.jpg[/img][/url]


[color=#00ff00]5[/color] [color=#ff0000]BIRD'S EGGS[/color]

[color=#00ff00][size="7"][b]For the Chickens, the Goose and the Dwarven Eggman:[/size] [/b][/color] in [color=#ff8c00]Whiterun [/color](Merchants:[i] Arcadia of Arcadia’s Cauldron, Anoriath, Hulda of the Bannered Mare[/i] ).The eggs are also in the dead creatures !

These "birds" are harmless creatures !

[url=http://www.hostingpics.net/viewer.php?id=695224IncubatedEggs5.jpg][img]http://img11.hostingpics.net/pics/695224IncubatedEggs5.jpg[/img][/url]


[color=#00ff00]14[/color] [color=#ff0000]SPIDER'S EGGS[/color]

[color=#00ff00][size="7"] [b]For the White Spider, the Roach, the Forest Spider and the Dwarvspider +[i] only in the version TER[/i], the Solstheim's Spiders, the Netch, the Ash Hopper and the Blue Butterfly: [/size][/b][/color] in [color=#ff8c00]Solitude [/color](Merchants: [i]Angeline at Angeline’s Aromatics, Corpulus at Winking Skeever, Sayma at Bits and Pieces, Addvar [/i] ).The eggs are also in the dead creatures !

[url=http://www.hostingpics.net/viewer.php?id=895863ArmyofForestSpiders.jpg][img]http://img11.hostingpics.net/pics/895863ArmyofForestSpiders.jpg[/img][/url]

[url=http://www.hostingpics.net/viewer.php?id=248396ArmyofDwarvspiders.jpg][img]http://img11.hostingpics.net/pics/248396ArmyofDwarvspiders.jpg[/img][/url]

[url=http://www.hostingpics.net/viewer.php?id=785286ArmyofWhiteSpiders.jpg][img]http://img11.hostingpics.net/pics/785286ArmyofWhiteSpiders.jpg[/img][/url]

->->->->->->->->->->->->->->->->[youtube]60GwagTtKKk[/youtube]<-<-<-<-<-<-<-<-<-<-<-<-<-<-<-


[color=#ff0000][b] INSTALLATION[/b][/color]

If you have my other mods with Incubated Eggs: [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/55592/?]Incubated Eggs[/url], [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/76666/?]Curious Birds Mounts and Armies [/url], [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/76681/?]Chimeras Mounts and Armies[/url], [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/76864/?]New Gryphons Mounts and Armies[/url], [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/76818/?]Snails and Slugs of Skyrim[/url], [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/77311/?]Repopulate with Mushrooms[/url], [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/73785/?]Griffins Mounts and Armies[/url],[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/68187/?]Gerbils Mounts and Followers [/url],[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/68832/?] Skaven Mounts and Followers [/url]or [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/55520/?] Incubated Winged Chocobos [/url], in order to find these eggs at Merchants, you must choose the mod for which you want to buy and place it at the bottom of the list in the Data Files when you launch the game.

[color=#00ff00][i] Only for the manual installation:[/i][/color]

You have to put the folder « Data » in "...Steam/SteamApps/common/skyrim "

[color=#00ff00][i] For the manual and the NMM installations:[/i][/color]

You must place the new .esp at the bottom of the list in the Data Files when you launch the game for the correction of some bugs...(Normally, this is done automatically)

You can put in your Skyrim.ini ( user / my documents / my games / Skyrim ) the following settings (you can copy / paste the following):

[Camera]

fVanityModeMaxDist=2000.0000
fVanityModeMinDist=10.0000
fMouseWheelZoomMinDelta=0.0050
fMouseWheelZoomSpeed=0.8000
fMouseWheelZoomIncrement=0.01
fMinCurrentZoom=0.001

These settings allow you to see all mounts (of my mods) correctly, whether your character takes his weapon out or not


[url=http://www.hostingpics.net/viewer.php?id=704380ArmyofRoaches.jpg][img]http://img11.hostingpics.net/pics/704380ArmyofRoaches.jpg[/img][/url]


[color=#ff0000][b] Bugs or Problems[/b][/color]

No fast travels with the army of little creatures!

They tend to be blocked by city doors

When the Chicken/Goose/Dwarven Eggman is in battle, it approaches the enemy and just stand their and lets itself be attacked and it doesn't fight back (there is no animation in the game for the chickens/Goose/Eggman to fight)

In the Oil Spider Death item, you have the "Albino Butt", i have not placed it in ! I don't understand

[color=#ff0000]Do not invoke the Real Dragons in homes ![/color]

The Blue Butterfly can’t fly... i search !...(The Butterfly is not a "creature" with a skeleton,
this is a animated static that move on a given path, like other critters such as Bees, Hawks, Pond Fish)

DO NOT GO DOWN (E key) when you are running fast (4 legs) with the Raptor ....A solution: mount again and QUICKLY TYPE THE KEYS Z (W ?), E and ALT

Some dead Netchs remain in the air !... Some dead Raptors remain standing !...It just give them a stroke of his sword...

[url=http://www.hostingpics.net/viewer.php?id=432263incubatedeggs2.jpg][img]http://img4.hostingpics.net/pics/432263incubatedeggs2.jpg[/img][/url]

[color=#ff0000] [size="6"] [b]Credits [/b][/size][/color]

1) For the Chickens/Goose and the Dwarven Eggman, Dwarven Worm, Dwarven Eyebot, + only on the version TER: Chagohod, Tyrant, Lich, Flying Chaurus

The textures of Chickens are from [color=#ff0000] Bellyache [/color]; Mod [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=3621 ] Bellyaches Animal and Creature Pack [/url]("Asset use permission": "You are allowed to use the assets in this file without permission as long as you credit me").

[color=#ff0000]Macadamstreet [/color] for the meshes and texture of the goose in his mod [url=http://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=125170176&searchtext=]Goosy goosa ! [/url]

[color=#ff0000]Jc1[/color] for the model of the Goose

[color=#ff0000] dogtown1 [/color]to convert the model of the Goose in skyrim

The mesh of the Flaming Chicken from [color=#ff0000]Darren83[/color] in his mod [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/54369/?] New Spell -El Pollo Diablo- [/url]

[color=#ff8c00]Vicn [/color] for the meshes of the Tyrant, the Flying Chaurus, the Lich, the Dwarven Eggman, the Chagohod, the Dwarven Eyebot and the Dwarven Worm, in his mod [url=http://naaaaikikvicnvicn.blog.fc2.com/blog-entry-36.html] Vicn Creature Resource [/url](”You can use any parts of this mod without my permission.”)

2) For some Eggs

[color=#ff0000]Kahjiit Raj[/color] in his mod [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/16831/?] Golden Egg Treasure Hunt [/url] for the textures (with: Wyeko,struckdumb,super_chicken,bigsteve7743,Enchantedgal,
WanderingSoul,kuschelirmel,Wisdoms_Pe,ttainted_sharben)
of some Eggs ("Asset use permission": "You are allowed to use the assets in this file without permission as long as you credit me").

3) For the Crab and the Dwarvcrab

[color=#ff8c00]UlithiumDragon[/color] for his Dwarven Mudcrab in his mod (modder resource) [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/48180//?]Dwemer Mechanical Mudcrab [/url]

[color=#ff8c00] Muppetpuppet [/color] for the meshe and the textures of the Rivercrab, in his mod: [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/9782/?]Moonpath to Elsweyr [/url] (« use everything you want »)

4) For the Mini Dragons, the Raptor and the Roach

[color=#ff8c00]Muppetpuppet[/color] for the Raptor, textures and meshe (“use everything you want”)

The Meshes/textures of the Roach, all the bone, naga (Model from [color=#ff8c00]DigitalLion[/color]), and other dragon models that are rigged to the Ice Wraith skeleton, were created and rigged by [color=#ff8c00] Dogtown1[/color] /[url=http://www.facebook.com/pages/Skymomod/514197991944324]Skymomod[/url] in the [url=http://bsnooch.com/forums/index.php?topic=822.0 ]Skyrim Monster Mod version 10 [/url]

The textures of the Mini Dragons are from [color=#ff8c00] lifestorock[/color] in his[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/24913 ] Skyrim Immersive Creatures[/url], Versions 2 and 3; and [color=#ff8c00] Bellyache[/color] in [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/20889 ]Bellyaches New Dragon Species and Ohdaviing Replacer[/url]

5) For Spiderman,Macho Man Chicken, Macho Man Dragon (in the 2.1.1 Special Edition only)

[color=#ff0000] FancyPantz[/color] for the meshes and textures of [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/4308]No Spiders - 'piderMan 'dition [/url], [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/5518/?]Macho Dragons [/url] and [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/4376/?]Macho Man Chickens [/url]
("You are allowed to use the assets in this file without permission")

6) For the Chaurus Hunters (in the version TER only)

[color=#ff0000]JSnider193[/color] for the new textures of the Chaurus Hunters ( Blood, Reptile, Pebbled) in his mod (« Modders resources and tutorials »): [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/6472/?]Critter Variants [/url] ("You can modify and use as needed")



Special thanks to [color=#ff0000] Billy Mays[/color] with his mod [url=http://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=276280477] Creepy Crawly - Army of Spiders [/url] who has inspired my mod !

files.name: Esp Version Francaise pour la Version 3-5-5TER
files.fileName: Esp Version Francaise pour la Version 3-5-5TER-55592-3-5-5TER.7z
files.changelogHtml:
New in the version 2.1.1/3.5.5 TER: New settings. The creatures don't attack you (??)

New in the version 3.5.4 TER: You can Mount the Netch + New settings for the 3 Crabs, the Raptor and the Dwarvworm

New in the version 3.5.3 TER: You can Mount the Raptor + minor changes

New in the version 3.5.2 TER: Many changes with the factions

New in the version 3.5.1 TER: No blood on the Lich or the Tyrant

New in the version 3.5 TER: Adds Real Dragons (Wingless, Old, Horned), Raptor, Flying Chaurus (Dragon) + a Blue Butterfly (Who can’t Fly)

New in the version 3.0 TER: Adds Real Dragons (Boss/Snow/Black/Ice Lake/Skeletal/Purple/Tyrant/Lich)

New in the version 2.5 TER: Adds Spectral Dragon, Scrib, Netch, Chagohod and the Solstheim’s Spiders (Albinos/Fire/Frost/Oil/Poison/Shock/Zombie)

New in the version 2.2 BIS: Adds 4 Chaurus Hunters (Vanilla/Blood/Reptile/Pebbled) and a Frozen Chaurus

New in the version 2.1: Adds a Mudcrab and a Roach

New in the Version 2.0.1: No Ice effects for the dragons (problem fixed i think...)

New in the Version 2.0: Adds 6 Mini Dragons (Bone Fire/Bone Frost/Death/Gold/Red/Swamp) and the Dwarven Eyebot

New in the Version 1.0.1: Increased the size of the Chickens, Goose,Dwarven Eggman

Version 1.0: Chaurus, Dwarven Worm, Crab, Dwarven Crab, White Spider, Forest Spider, Dwarven Spider, White Chicken, Bicolor Chicken, Flaming Chicken, Goose, Dwarven Eggman
